rupture.title: We are living a rupture comparable to the invention of writing.
rupture.paragraph2: What remains is what has always been essential:
rupture.conclusion1: This is not learned in tutorials.

futuroAncestral.title: ANCESTRAL FUTURE
futuroAncestral.line1: We use technology from the future
futuroAncestral.line2: to reveal truths that have always existed.
futuroAncestral.comparison: Like fire. Like writing. Like language.

entry.line2: Not every work needs to exist.
entry.line3: But if you've come this far,

opening.line3: We are not a studio in the common sense.

description.line1: A place where art, technology and identity
description.line3: Where founders learn to direct themselves like films.
description.line4: Where creators discover their own language.

method.line1: We treat each brand as a work.
method.line3: Each project as an atelier of investigation.

truth.line1: The soul already exists before the logo.
truth.line2: Our job is to reveal it.

selectedWork.title: Who trusted us
selectedWork.subtitle1: They all grew because they created a narrative + a category + a system.
selectedWork.subtitle2: Not because they were the best.
selectedWork.subtitle3: Because they were the only ones.
selectedWork.bottomNote: Click on each case to see details

alan-nicolas.name: Alan Nicolas
alan-nicolas.fullDescription: Alan Nicolas is one of Brazil's top AI specialists. Creator of Academia Lendária, he transformed his technical expertise into a powerful personal brand generating over $40M in revenue. His growth from 6K to 262K followers demonstrates the power of authentic narrative combined with scalable systems.
achievements: From 6K to 262K followers in less than 2 years
Students earning 6 figures in 4 months with AI
National reference in applied artificial intelligence
alan-nicolas.quote: Mastering the technique isn't enough. You need to create a narrative that makes people want to learn from you.

alexandra-loras.name: Alexandra Loras
alexandra-loras.description: Former French Consul, Shark Tank, 20+ awards
alexandra-loras.fullDescription: Alexandra Loras is a former French Consul in Brazil and today one of the most influential voices in diversity and high impact. Her participation as a Shark on Shark Tank Brazil consolidated her position as a reference in purpose-driven investments. With over 20 international awards, she proves that social impact and business success go together.
achievements: Featured in Forbes and major international outlets
alexandra-loras.quote: Diversity isn't just an agenda. It's business strategy.

davi-ribas.name: Davi Ribas
davi-ribas.fullDescription: Davi Ribas is the creator of 'Movement Is The New Branding'. Founder of ETER Co, he developed a revolutionary methodology where movement replaces product as the center of the brand. With 154K followers and work as an international consultant, he helps companies earn millions building causes, not just products.
achievements: Partner companies earn millions with cause
davi-ribas.quote: Products win for a while. Movements win forever.

edgar-ueda.name: Edgar Ueda
edgar-ueda.fullDescription: Edgar Ueda is CEO of Neximob, one of Brazil's largest real estate networks. With a unique system of real estate intelligence and national expansion, he built an empire of $1.2 billion in sales. His story is proof that scale and quality can coexist when there's a system behind it.
edgar-ueda.quote: System is what transforms individual talent into collective results.

rafa-medeiros.name: Rafa Medeiros
rafa-medeiros.fullDescription: Rafa Medeiros is an Enneagram specialist applied to business, trained in California. As a TEDx Speaker, she has trained over 15,000 professionals in her methodology that combines self-knowledge with business performance. Her premium clients report doubling revenue after applying her method.
rafa-medeiros.quote: When you understand who you are, the market starts to understand too.

pillars.subtitle: The Bauhaus of the AI Era — where you learn to unite technology, art and consciousness
pillars.quote: Think like an artist, create like an engineer

ia.title: AI
ia.description: Technical mastery of artificial creation tools
